column1: # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last weekend there was a parade in the downtown area of my city , and I decided to take my little sister - we had so much fun !
#id=2
#text=I 'm not old enough to drive and our parents were busy , so I decided to take the bus .
#id=3

#text=I went online and looked at the bus route to determine which stop let us off closest to the parade , and then I looked at the bus schedule to see what time the bus would come and how often it ran .
#id=4
#text=I also found out how much the ride costs , and Mom gave me the money I needed for both of us .
#id=5
#text=The day of the parade my sister and I walked the two short blocks to the bus stop and waited inside the little bus shelter .
#id=6
#text=When the bus came , the driver came to a stop and the doors opened and we walked up the two steps .
#id=7
#text=We said hello to the driver and paid the fare - my sister loved putting the coins in the fare box .
#id=8
#text=We walked a few steps down the aisle and took a seat near the front of the bus and settled in to look out of the window .
#id=9
#text=The bus made a lot of stops and all types of people got on and off of the bus ; it was pretty noisy !
#text=When I could tell we were getting close to our stop , I pulled the chord to alert the driver that we were getting off at the next stop .
#text=When we reached our stop , my sister and I walked down the aisle and off of the bus .
#text=We were just in time to see the beginning of the parade !
